185735667.review: Jogo muito bom, mas a comunidade ta meio morta e é meio repetitivo.

185735045.review:
RoN mag schon etwas älter sein, ist aber auch grafisch in Würde gealtert. Es ist eher zugänglich als megakomplex. Die historischen Kampagnen und der Welteroberungsmodus machen wirklich Riesenspaß. 
Ein echt tolles Echtzeitstrategie-Spiel mit rudimentären Globalstrategie-Elementen, sehr zu empfehlen.

185706486.review:
RTS très chill à jouer entre potes.
Des mécaniques différentes des célèbres Age of Empire notamment au niveau de la récolte des ressources et de la gestion du territoire.
La possibilité de construire de nombreuses merveilles qui apportent des avantages est intéressante.

185691450.review: Ulusların özellikleri detaylı çalışılmış, mimariden askeriyeye kadar her alanda ulusların özelikleri olması oyunu diğerlerinden farklı kılıyor. Oyunun kendi içindeki dengesi harika. Tek bir yönden gelişmenin bir faydası yok. Hem bilimsel hem kültürel hem ekonomik hem de askeri olarak hep bir arada gelişilmesi gerekiyor

185616495.review: What can I say except that this is a classic RTS and I have been playing it on and off since it came out around 20 years ago.  The balancing is off on the Alexander The Great campaign but besides that it still plays great!  Loved it back then, and I still love it now.

185602278.review: Thanking the devs for abandoning this game as if they ever created Rise of Nations 2 I wouldn't have life any longer :)

185552987.review: This and age of empires 2 are by far the best conquer games , but Starcraft will always be the best for strategy

185545897.review:
Best RTS.
Combines the mechanics of city managing/building with real time combat from familiar games.
It has a ton of features that make unit control easy, some things are even automated.
Visually, the UI is incredibly easy to read and intuitive. Techs are color coded (even babi can understand).
Keep in mind, it was marketed as "world history in 90 minutes", but you can chose
the pace (tech speed, cost etc...).

Personally, I love this game. 
The end credit song is also neat.

185539584.review: Great game to spend time with friends. Funny, not complicated, just pure chaos :)

185504229.review: 小时候最喜欢的rts之一，也是希望有重制版的一个。

185502026.review:

185454750.review: Este é o RTS que eu mais gosto

185443050.review: An oldie but a goodie. This game has more information about each of the historic elements than similar games like AOE2. There is much less micro that is relevant in this game compared to AOE2, with an emphasis on macro. The Conquer the World campaigns are very fun. Alexander the Great is probably the best. The New World campaign is great - can play as natives, europeans, or americans. I love this game.

185419903.review: My first and most favorite, and nostalgic, strategy in my entire life...after that comes AoE and CnC

185345537.review: eines der besten Strategiespiele aller Zeiten

185318464.review: WISH RISE OF LEGENDS WAS ON STEAM TOO, WAS IT AS GOOD...NO BUT I LOVED THESE

185101231.review: Very addictive fun game. Lots of possibilities.

185100851.review: This game is hella addictive if you asked me. Everytime i'm about to play another games, my brain would immediately go to Rise of Nations. Probably because i'm addicted to it. Its one of the first games i played since i was 3 or 4. Can't clearly remember. But it's so good. It's similar to Command&Conquer Kane's Wrath and Rise of Legends spinoff of Rise of Nations. Highly recommend for potato computer and new ones.

184727897.review:
A classic strategy game that everyone needs to try at least once. This game awoke in me the desire to paint maps. This led me to Civilization IV/V then to Europa Universalis 4, Hearts of Iron 4 and Victoria 2/3. 

Rise of Nations is one of the games that formed my identity as a video game player. I absolutely adore it!

184193136.review:
One of the best strategy games ever.
+ Multiple Nations
+ Multiple Soldiers (foot, water, air, rockets!)
+ Great Economic System
+ Ages (ancient, medieval, age of gunpowder, industrial (like WW1), modern (WW2), information (Don't worry no cosmonauts or futuristic ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥, you just can research very good things like immediately spawn soldiers and so)
+ Extended Edition
+ Graphics

I cant recommend it enough
